dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: My name’s Hong Lu. I hope we can get along well.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Good morning, Dante! My resident chef once taught me that truffles are wonderful for relieving morning fatigue~

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: An interesting thing I noted here was that I was able to learn how it feels to be hungry. What a curious sensation it is!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: The evening has its own beauty. Although the view isn’t as clear as my room’s window… it’s still nice that you’re here with me.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: When I go back home later, Dante, I’d love to invite you to a fabulous gala. I’ll introduce my new friends to Father, too… It’ll be such a fun time.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: When you’re distraught, simply remember that life goes on even if what you’re doing now doesn’t work out. Then, you’ll be free of worries.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Family… I heard that family is like a sanctuary offering each other shelter, right? I thought it was more like a cohort of kin looking to stab each other in the back at every turn all my life~

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Oh? Has an urgent matter arisen, Dante? Take your time~

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Golly, I can’t wait~

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I hope something fun happens~

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: What is it, Dante?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I’ll do what I can~ If it flunks, it flunks~

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Haha. What an amusing moment~

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Oh my!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: I never run out of new sights to see~

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Oh dear, does it hurt a lot? Please tell me later.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Ahaha, there’s no need to shower me with praise.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Oh dear~ Don’t blame yourself too much. It just wasn’t your day.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Oh… Is this thanks to me, perhaps? Anyway, it’s nice to hear that we’ve won~

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: No need to shower me with compliments~ I’m sure you had a part in it, too.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: It is what it is, wouldn’t you agree? Don’t be so dour~
